label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Disabled the proxy's /shutdown endpoint by default in edge-24.6.2, which can be reenabled with --set proxy.enableShutdownEndpoint=true.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added config to disable the proxy /shutdown admin endpoint.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added JSON output support to the link, unlink, allow, and allow-scrapes CLI commands.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Added a nil check when reading the endpoint hostname.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added control for logging HTTP headers in debug output, supported JSON output for several CLI commands.
